live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
51416.summary: Rogers 3G and LTE services are experiencing interruptions to their services. Customers with home phone services will not be able to reach cellphone users during this time through voice or text.
51416.title: July 8 – National| Rogers 3G and LTE Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
